description:
Hi. Komatsu speaking.
Did you know a kiln reaches temperatures between 1100 and 1300 degrees
C? Which means summer is Hell! Especially when there`s a heatwave. I
can`t stand it.
Muco is drained. I`m irritated.
This is the story of the hottest day in summer.
Seriously. It`s hot...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Hottest Day of the Summer!
